1.title: Tricked out Trucks and Diving with Orcas
1.plot: Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. A team of brothers taking on the high velocity sport of sidecar motocross, the curious crew of Japanese truck drivers that turn the long-haul into a full-time disco, and a record-breaking grandmother whose fitness goals are impressive at any age.

2.title: Top Secret Tarts and Innovative Origami
2.plot: Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. A group of urban cowboys taking to the streets of Philadelphia to spread hope, an iron man who doesn't let his wheelchair hold him back, and a former NASA engineer whose unique hobby is solving some of humanity's most complicated problems - with paper.

3.title: Wall of Death and Savings Elephants
3.plot: Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. An amusement park made entirely by hand by just one man, an artist who creates massive, intricate murals in the fresh snow with his steps, and a mountaineer, with no arms or legs, that climbs some of the tallest mountains in the world.

4.title: Pedicures in Prison and an Island of Rabbits
4.plot: Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. A pair of skiers shredding the world's highest sand dunes, the shark attack survivor who refused to give us his surfboard, and a group of prisoners finding a second chance through beauty.

5.title: Pounding Mochi and the Enchanted Highway
5.plot: Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. A master of mochi who faces down danger to make the tasty treat, a freediver swimming up close and personal with sea lions, and a town in Europe whose name is 60 letters long and a doozy to pronounce.

6.title: Bionic Animals and Scaling Icicles
6.plot: Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. The unusual place that your dollars go when they die, the president or a self-declared nation in the middle of the Nevada desert, and the hippest ballet troupe in all of Chicago.

7.title: High-Stakes Dining and the Duck Squad
7.plot: "Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. South Africa's finest wine, tended by an army of ducks, a man with the secret to growing some of the largest vegetables in the world, and a tasty delicacy that could definitely kill you if prepared the wrong way. "

8.title: Warriors of Hula and Spying on Animals
8.plot: Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. A house, built by a DIY architect, that looks straight out of a Dr. Seuss book, the man behind the mushroom jumping video game hero, Mario, and a bank that stores over 5,000 brains.

9.title: Fishing for Bikes and Racing Drones
9.plot: Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. The deadliest garden in the world, a man who has spent half his life searching for the Loch Ness Monster, and a father and son competing in one of the most exciting new sports, drone racing.

10.title: The Grizzly Kid and an Eco-Island Paradise
10.plot: Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. The fearless biologist who crawls into black bear dens, the man behind one of the hardest, and most peculiar, foot races on the planet, and an incredible floating home made entirely from scratch.

11.title: Wheelchair Flips and Island of Dolls
11.plot: Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. A group of holocaust survivors celebrating the beauty of life in an unlikely way, the adrenaline junkie who treats his wheelchair like a skateboard, and a man on a mission to protect the quietest place in the United States.

12.title: Magic Town and the Zombie Fitness Fanatic
12.plot: Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. A fitness model and body builder who - literally - doesn't have a heart, an ancient Japanese town that's the epicenter of fake food, and an artist who uses the wind to transform his massive work of art.

13.title: Healing with Wolves and Skydive Dancing
13.plot: Great Big Story presents The Great Big Show, a collection of cinematic shorts that make the world feel a little bit smaller. The elaborate and high-flying human towers of Catalonia, a puppet prodigy creating intricate and life-like characters with his hands, and a group of veterans finding comfort from an unlikely source, wolves.

imdb.title: Great Big Show
plot: Great Big Story presents an Emmy-nominated collection of cinematic shorts for the intellectually curious. The _Great Big Show_ (qv) intrigues and excites with stories from more than 80 countries around the world.
